Query the network to find a balance from an address


```graphql
balance(
  address: Address!
): Balance
```


### Arguments

#### [<code style={{ fontWeight: 'normal' }}>balance.<b>address</b></code>](#)<Bullet />[`Address!`](/build/api/schema/scalars/address) <Badge class="secondary" text="non-null"/> <Badge class="secondary" text="scalar"/>
> 
> 

### Type

#### [`Balance`](/build/api/schema/objects/balance) <Badge class="secondary" text="object"/>
> [Balance] represents a ledger balance.
It includes:
- UCO: uco balance
- token: token balances
